#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <map>
#include <string>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	string s;
	int n,x,y;
	int i;
	int ar[20005];
	map<string,int> m;
	map<string,int> :: iterator it;
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&y);
	while(n&&y){
	x = n;
	while(x--){
		cin >> s;
		m[s]++;
	}
	for(i = 0; i <= n; i++){
		ar[i] = 0;
	}
	for(it = m.begin(); it != m.end(); it++){
		ar[(*it).second]++;
	}
	for(i = 1; i <= n; i++){
		printf("%d\n",ar[i]);
	}
	m.clear();
	scanf("%d%d",&n,&y);
	}

	return 0;
}
